text: Joël Giraud (born 14 October 1959 in Gap, Hautes-Alpes) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Hautes-Alpes department, and is a member of La République En Marche! (formerly of the Radical Party of the Left) and former Secretary of the Economic Affairs Committee. He was elected on 16 June 2002, and re-elected on 17 June 2007, 17 June 2012 and in 2017.M. title: Joël Giraud
